descriptionHtml:
Read Quran Offline- Holy Quran Majeed free Muslim pro reciting holy book Is helping the Muslims in all over world to recite the Koran book & read quran free of cost . Holy Quran 15 line reading and learning Reading Koran app is a reminder to remember Allah everywhere and anytime. Reading Quran Pak - Quran Majeed Just for the fulfilling the task of Tilawat-e-HOLY QURAN MAJEED- القرآن الكريم has maintained the flawless digital version of koran book القران المجيد to satisfy the urge of learning and inner satisfaction.
When you Read Quran Pak HD you can feel like you pick an Actual Quran in your hand.

📖 HD Quran القرآن الكريم has an modern style, Don't bother & disturb yourself by scrolling up and down; You can easily recite as actual Color printed Holy Quran majeed page by page. This Free Quran app is best companion for you anywhere, anytime. During Travel, or if you are in Masjid after say pray (Namaz) you can read this Quran Book app in you android device without any effort.

📖 Free Holy Quran has a real & elegant page turning effect, modern style, smooth Arabic font and different modes for better readability.
Especially we added a new feature in our Quran Majeed Holy Koran that is Adjust the Brightness of your screen it’s an totally free to use feature for you.
Now it comes with bundle of new customization options for giving your eyes an lite comfort level while reading this original quran book Koran majeed app.

Al Quran Kareem – Holy koran book has specific standard format of 15 lines per page with search format as you can search any Para, Surah, Ayat, Roku & Manzil during your reading the HD quran majeed holy Kuran app.


📖 Reading Quran Pak Offline provides the following features:

📖 HD & Real Pages
Free Arabic Quran Majeed كتاب القران الكريم offline app offers personalized page cover colored layer or page screen saver to generate a lightest and dim light effect Free Holy Koran Pak offline. Its provides an actual look of same as Original Quran pages in your hand. We highly designed our pages and provides them an actual look of Real Quran Majeed book.

🔖 Bookmarks
We introduce new Bookmark Feature in this Quran Majeed Holy Koran Book app that helps you to build bookmarks file. Holy Quran Majeed Offline Reading القران المجيد can Add bookmarks to revise and recite Ayats, chapters, and Surahs. While reading the Quran pak just tap the bookmark icon in quick toolbar to save the current page of Holy Quran Majeed.

🌐 Offline Reading (Without Internet)
With this Quran kareem Holy Koran Majeed Offline reading app you can read easily quran pak without internet. Sometime users face an problem they don’t have internet access in some places. So now that peoples easily Read this offline reading reciting Quran majeed holy koran book free kuran app.


🕋 Qibla Finder
In this Holy Quran Pak app you can use an Highly Trended feature of Find Qibla direction on the Gps Map through the Qibla finder compass. Qibla finder for namaz determines the mecca direction accurately. Kibla Finder & Mecca finder compass is a functional and accurate Qibla compass app without needing unnecessary permission.
Specially if you don’t have internet access you can use it without internet in offline reading quran and qibla compass finder mecca free app.

🔗 Sharing with Friends
Be a part in spreading the Holy Quran majeed koran pak Book of Allah and help others to gather its blessings. Share it with friends and family via Sms, Email. Specially on ( Social Media)

Lite Features:
📖 Elegant Color Free Quran For Read like Original Quran Pak Book
📖 Read Holy Quran pak offline (Without internet access)
📖 Full page readability
📖 15 Lines Hafizi Offline reading Quran
📖 Surah Index

📖 Totally HD Holy Quran Majeed Koran Book HD Arabic Excellent Readability

Feedback
We warmly welcome your suggestions, and improvement ideas.
